group1Title: Why become a PAMM Manager at Premier?
group1Subtitle: Premier provides the technology and framework so you can focus on generating returns.
card2Subtitle: The platform, reporting and account infrastructure are handled for you, so you can manage multiple investors from a single point of execution.
card3Subtitle: You decide when to open, manage, and close positions. Investors choose to allocate to your approach and follow your decisions in proportion to their capital.
card4Title: Your performance can attract more investors
card4Subtitle: As your track record develops, you can bring in additional investors, grow your client base, and increase your potential earnings from performance fees.
